name: python-twitter-guide
description: Code snippets and links to docs around using Twitter API and Tweepy
author: MichaelCurrin

scripts.fix-paths: BEFORE='#\/' && AFTER='\/' && sed "s/${BEFORE}/${AFTER}/g; s/?id=/#/g" $(find build -type f)
scripts.build: node navToRoutes && presite docs && npm run cp-build && npm run fix-paths
